Content.Text:
<NAME_MOB_DIETER>
I beg your pardon, but I have brought an
assortment of wares for your perusal.

<NAME_MOB_DIETER>
It is my pleasure to make your acquaintance. My
name is <BLUE>Dmitri</BLUE>. I am a door-to-door salesman.
<PAGE>
I heard from my friend Reiner that you have a
discerning eye for good merchandise.
<PAGE>
Would you be interested in seeing what I have to
offer?

<NAME_MOB_DIETER>
Now then, would you care to see some of my
notable wares?

<NAME_MOB_DIETER>
This item is from my personal cache. I believe
you would find it an excellent purchase.
<PAGE>
It is this <ITEMNAME0>. Presently, I
have <MOJI0> for sale. The price is a mere...

<NAME_MOB_DIETER>
This item is from my personal cache. I believe
you would find it an excellent purchase.
<PAGE>
It's this blueprint for a <ITEMNAME0>.
I have <MOJI0>, for a mere...

<NAME_MOB_DIETER>
<ITEMNAME1>G. Opportunity knocks
but once. You in or out?
Money: <MOJI0>G

<NAME_MOB_DIETER>
A most excellent decision. I'm quite pleased.
Er...to do business with you.

<NAME_MOB_DIETER>
Here you are. Thank you for your patronage.
<PAGE>
I will come again at a later date with more items
I think you'll appreciate. Have a pleasant day.

<NAME_MOB_DIETER>
What? You don't want it? Hngrrrh! ...Oh well.

<NAME_MOB_DIETER>
Here is your purchase. Hrm? You seem to lack
space in your bag. I shall have it delivered to
your home at a later time, then.
<PAGE>
Thank you for your patronage. I will come again
at a later date with more items I think you'll
appreciate.

<NAME_MOB_DIETER>
What's this? Your bag is full!
<PAGE>
A pity. I shall have to save this item for a later
opportunity. Have a pleasant day.

<NAME_MOB_DIETER>
What's this? Not enough money?! Well then, I
suppose this transaction has hit a dead end.
<PAGE>
Well then, I suppose I shall take my leave. You
really should keep more money on hand for
situations like these. Next time, then.
